title: Jeremy Corbyn refuses to back an election until no deal is off the table
text:
Labour was in disarray tonight as Jeremy Corbyn refused to say whether he would back an election next week - even if Brussels granted a three month Brexit delay.

The Labour leader on Thursday night said he would only back a poll if “no deal has been taken off the table” but refused to say whether Brussels granting a delay until Jan 31 would satisfy his demands.

He also declined to say whether Labour would back the Prime Minister’s motion, due to be voted on Monday, which would see an election held on Dec 12.

However, just minutes beforehand, it emerged that Labour MPs had received an email from the party’s whips office ordering them to abstain, meaning Mr Johnson’s request is likely to be...
description: Labour was in disarray tonight as Jeremy Corbyn refused to say whether he would back an election next week - even if Brussels granted a three month Brexit delay.
